result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, Great George St, 1號金百利廣場4樓R1號鋪
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, Great George St, 1號金百利廣場4樓R1號鋪
result.name: Chili Party

reviews.text:
Chili Party is awesome for their spicy food and friendly staffs.
The restaurant is easy to reach, as it's located right next to the Sogo, and it's the heart of Causeway Bay! 
And the food here is great, you can choose the level of spicy based on your preference.  Staffs here are friendly, they are willing to explain what is the difference between dishes, and keep the restaurant clean.  Price here is reasonable, it's not that expensive for the food in this area.
Although I don't really agree with their restaurant decoration with a dark theme design, but all other aspects are great
Inattentive and forgetful service - despite surplus of staff. Substandard food quality. Smudges and grease in “clean” dishes. Never coming back again.
Loved it!!! Water cooked fish... Lots if fish couldn't finish it between three of us. Very generous with portion sizes
Food was stellar. Their spicy levels top notch and the restaurant has a good vibe. If they skip the american music, they’d have a home run! Will definitely come again. Also, rather inexpensive!

Worth to try if you like hot and spicy food. But waiting for left to go up there is a pain. Highly recommend sweet and sour pork (for those people don't like hot and spicy) Sichuan style fish (for those love HOT)!

result.name: 麻辣派對

reviews.text: 食物種類都算多，有辣有唔辣。但叫得麻辣派對就梗係吃辣啦！食物份量都算幾多，配菜用料豐富，服務態度ok。但環境比較昏暗，唔適合影相。

Chili Party is awesome for their spicy food and friendly staffs.
The restaurant is easy to reach, as it's located right next to the Sogo, and it's the heart of Causeway Bay! 
And the food here is great, you can choose the level of spicy based on your preference.  Staffs here are friendly, they are willing to explain what is the difference between dishes, and keep the restaurant clean.  Price here is reasonable, it's not that expensive for the food in this area.
Although I don't really agree with their restaurant decoration with a dark theme design, but all other aspects are great
短時間內已經同家人去咗3次 服務態度都算ok 位置都幾好坐 都算多嘢食多選擇 價錢唔算貴 嘢食好野味好好食 唔係好食得辣嘅人可以叫BB辣 有香味得嚟唔會好辣 連我阿爸呢個唔食得辣嘅人都接受到👍👍 不過我地就對佢地個紅燒牛腩小麵有d失望(無影到) 本身牛腩同個麵都唔錯 但個湯底竟然係出前一丁麻油麵陣味 (我同阿爸都係咁覺得) 令我地覺得好奇怪

份量好夠
麻婆豆腐好惹味
酸辣粉有啲太lum 無乜咬口
魚骨魚鱗，應有盡有，食辣野仲要比熱水，威到爆
